schema.name: Position_in_organization_arm
schema.description: The definition of a position in an organization and the relationships between positions and organizations.

entity.name: Direct_supervision_relationship
entity.description:
A direct supervision relationship is a coordinating mechanism to control the flow of authority between positions, a superior and his/her subordinates. The superior issues instructions and monitors the performance of the subordinates.
Together, the supervision relationships of a superior with his/her subordinates constitute the structure of an organization.

explicit.name: organization
explicit.description: The organization that is defines the direct supervision relationship.

explicit.name: subordinate
explicit.description: The position that is the subordinate.

explicit.name: superior
explicit.description: The position that is the superior.

entity.name: Person_in_position
entity.description:
A position is held by a person. A person may hold more than one position within an organization or organizations.
Bill Gates holds two positions at Microsoft: Chairman and Chief Architect.
There can be max. 1 effective person_in_position for one position.

explicit.name: description
explicit.description: The text that characterizes the person in the position.

explicit.name: name
explicit.description: The label by which the person in position is known.

explicit.name: person
explicit.description: The person who holds the position.

explicit.name: position
explicit.description: The position that is held by the person.

entity.name: Position
entity.description:
A position is a function or job performed by a person. It defines responsibilities and activities. A position that is not fulfilled by a person is a vacancy.
Company Director
Service Engineer

explicit.name: description
explicit.description: The text that characterizes the position.

explicit.name: name
explicit.description: The label by which the position is known.

explicit.name: position_context
explicit.description: The position that is used by the organization.

entity.name: Position_group
entity.description:
A group collecting people in their positions to cooperate in a mutually beneficial outcome without formal supervision relationships.
People representing utility companies who cooperate with each other to coordinate road works.

entity.name: Position_group_relationship
entity.description: The participation of a position in a group.

explicit.name: position
explicit.description: The position that belongs to the group.

entity.name: Position_type
entity.description:
A position type is a recognized kind of position. It enables a person to be assigned to tasks.
CEO, manager, service engineer, programmer, aircraft engineering technician propulsion

explicit.name: organization
explicit.description: The organization that uses the type of position.
